successes.title: An Honest Liar: The Amazing Randi Story
successes.description: An award-winning documentary about the famed magician, escape artist, and skeptic James "The Amazing". The film also features Penn & Teller, Adam Savage, Bill Nye, and more!

Pledges.description: Get the newsletter updates & the warm and fuzzy feeling that comes from knowing that YOU helped promote critical thinking and get a cool documentary made. Plus, as an added bonus, Randi will send you his thanks - using only the power of his mind!
Let the world know you helped! You get the above plus an official THANK YOU on the filmâ€™s website!

You get special, members-only access to a PASSWORD PROTECTED PRIVATE SECTION of the film's web site with unique, frequently updated behind-the-scenes content and clips as well as a page with a video thank-you message to donors from Randi, plus all of the above!

You get a pair of unique, special-edition etched wood "Honest Liar" drink coasters! The design honors Randi's "Pigasus" award for the biggest  frauds Randi noted over the previous year, and the open handcuffs represent his incredible feats as an escape artist. You can choose wood type at the completion of the campaign - aromatic cedar, birch, maple, and cherry. Use it whenever you raise a toast to truth and critical thinking. (Aprox. 3.8" square)
Plus, you get all the rewards from above!

NEW!!!  "The Amazing Deck" - A 100% custom-designed unique deck of playing cards.  Available nowhere else, this beautiful, intricately illustrated deck is an ode to Randi, skepticism, & science.  The face cards have gorgeous illustrations of his heroes of choice, including, as the Kings: Houdini, Isaac Asimov, Martin Gardener, and Carl Sagan.  Randi is the Joker - but in this deck, it's the "Charlatan"!  We'll reveal the Queens & Jacks soon, so stay tuned! (Any guesses?)

"The Amazing Deck" is no novelty reward - it will be professionally manufactured by the U.S. Playing Card Company, on the same Q1 highest quality casino regulation poker card stock used in Bicycle and Bee decks with the "Magic Finish" (the preferred finish for professionals and magicians.)  The cool, vintage-style illustrations will ensure this stylish limited-edition deck will be a cherished collectible!
NEW!!! AN HONEST LIAR MOVIE POSTER! We haven't made it yet, but we will for the opening of the film - and it will be a big, cool, badass poster.

A DIGITAL DOWNLOAD of the film! Plus everything from the $20 reward tier! (Add wood or leather coasters too - see rewards graphic for details. Int'l shipping fee only for coasters.) NOTE: This reward requires NO SHIPPING FEE. Shipping fee applies ONLY IF you decide to add coasters to the reward!
A DIGITAL DOWNLOAD of the film! Plus everything from the $20 reward tier! Woohoo!
AN OFFICIAL DVD of AN HONEST LIAR, complete with bonus scenes and DVD extras!
Plus everything from the $20 reward tier! (Add wood or leather coasters too - see rewards graphic for details.)
NEW!  $60 value for $50! Everything from the $30 reward tier, plus a set of 4 "Honest Liar" coasters in the wood of your choice!  Have a stylish place to set your drinks while enjoying the film!

NEW!!! AN HONEST LIAR MOVIE POSTER, SIGNED BY BOTH DIRECTORS! A big, badass poster. We haven't made it yet, but we will for the opening of the film - and it will be cool. PLUS - everything from the $30 reward tier!
See the film in all it's high-definition glory - an official Blu-Ray DVD of AN HONEST LIAR, complete with bonus scenes and DVD extras!
Plus everything from the $20 reward tier! (Add wood or leather coasters too - see rewards graphic for details.)

An UNCUT SHEET of The AMAZING DECK! These are highly desired by collectors and look gorgeous framed! You'll be able to display all the great illustrated cards at once, including a double-back card (so you can see an example of the rear design from the front.) This is your only chance to get one - they will be ordered when the deck is made, and no more will be made after that! (Dimensions: 21 7/8" X 26 3/8"). Plus, you get a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD of the film! (See $105 to add a -cut- deck of the cards!)
You get "The Amazing Deck" SIGNED BY THE AMAZING RANDI! It's amazing squared! Plus, everything from the $30 reward level!

Everything from the $75 reward, plus a set of 4 "Honest Liar" coasters in the wood of your choice! Have a stylish place to set your drinks while enjoying the film & bonus scenes in high-definition glory!

An UNCUT SHEET of The AMAZING DECK - PLUS an AMAZING DECK! You get the uncut sheet plus an actual deck, AND you get a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD of the film! (You can add DVD for +$15, Blu-ray for +$45, see FAQ at bottom of page.)
You get "The Amazing Deck" SIGNED BY THE AMAZING RANDI! It's amazing squared! PLUS, you get a DVD of the film!

CARD COLLECTORS BARGAIN! You get a half brick - 6 Amazing Decks! Six decks for less than the price of 5 individually! Plus, you get a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD of the film and everything else from the $30 reward level!
A HARDCOVER copy (out of print!) of Randi's fabulous book "An Encyclopedia of Claims, Frauds, and Hoaxes of the Occult and Supernatural", PERSONALLY SIGNED BY JAMES RANDI!
Plus, everything from the $30 reward tier! (Add wood or leather coasters too - see rewards graphic for details.)
Everything from the $125 reward, plus a DVD of the film!
You get "The Amazing Deck" SIGNED BY THE AMAZING RANDI! It's amazing squared! PLUS you get a Blu-ray of the film!
Everything from the $125 reward, plus a Blu-ray of the film!

NEW REWARD!!! Only 25 in existence! Production still from the film of ADAM SAVAGE together with JAMES RANDI - SIGNED BY BOTH! The old mythbuster and the new! On high-quality Kodak Professional Endura stock, 8" x 10". Plus, you get everything from the $30 reward level!

You get a SIGNED, NUMBERED, LIMITED EDITION PRINT of a portrait of RANDI done by SIMPSONS animator Anna Maltese - signed by BOTH James Randi and Anna Maltese! These are numbered 1 - 150 (first-come first-served) and available nowhere else! Plus, everything from the $30 reward tier! (Add wood or leather coasters too - see rewards graphic for details.)
Everything from the $200 reward, plus a DVD of the film!

An UNCUT SHEET of The AMAZING DECK - SIGNED by JAMES RANDI! There will only be 150 of these signed by Randi - this is an extra-special collectible and gorgeous item to display! Uncut playing card sheets are highly desired by collectors and look gorgeous framed! You'll be able to display all the great illustrated cards at once, including a double-back card (so you can see an example of the back of the deck from the front.) This is your only chance to get one - they will be ordered when the deck is made, and no more will be made after that! (Approx 22" x 26.5") PLUS, you get AN AMAZING DECK (the cut version!) and a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD of the film! (You can add DVD for +$15, Blu-ray for +$45, see FAQ at bottom of page.)
Everything from the $200 reward, plus a Blu-ray of the film!

A HARDCOVER copy (out of print!) of Randi's fabulous book "Conjuring", PERSONALLY SIGNED BY JAMES RANDI!  Plus, everything from the $30 reward tier! (Add wood or leather coasters too - see rewards graphic for details.)
Everything from the $250 reward, plus a DVD of the film!
Everything from the $250 reward, plus a Blu-ray of the film!
An official DVD of "Good to See You Again, Alice Cooper" - a movie of the 1973 "Billion Dollar Babies Tour" that Randi was in - PERSONALLY SIGNED BY BOTH JAMES RANDI AND ALICE COOPER!
You also get your choice of a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD, DVD, or BLU-RAY of the film, and everything from the $20 reward tier. (Add wood or leather coasters too - see rewards graphic for details.)

NEW!!! Can't afford the $850 to talk to Sylvia Browne? Donate $600 and The Amazing One will call or Skype with YOU to thank you for supporting the film! Chat about magic, science, his eyebrows, whatever you'd like! (But please no more than a half-hour or so, he's not getting any younger!)
Plus, your choice of a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD, DVD, or BLU-RAY of the film, and everything from the $25 reward tier!

"Towards a New Beginning (Green)" A SIGNED, NUMBERED, LIMITED EDITION ART PRINT (edition of 7 with 3 artist proofs) by artist Jose Alvarez (D.O.P.A.) (Randi's partner who also appears in the film.) Jose's work is in the permanent collections of numerous museums - see the gallery that represents him (http://www.gavlakgallery.com/artists/jose-alvarez/) for more info on his work. These are being offered here at significantly below market rate. You also get your choice of a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD, DVD, or BLU-RAY of the film, and everything from the $20 reward tier. (Add wood or leather coasters too - see rewards graphic for details.)
